message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CASE_ID_NOT_SET
message.locale: A case identifier must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_EXTERNAL_CASE_AUDIT_DATA_NOT_SET
message.locale: An external case audit data id must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_ID_EXISTS_FOR_DATA_SET
message.locale: The case identifier %1s already exists for external case audit data set %2s.
